title: Unveiling Deception: Evaluating NLPâ€™s Effectiveness in Identifying Misleading Responses from Large Language Models
subtitle: Undergraduate thesis work
description: In This day and age of Large Language Models like Chatgpt,We provided an way to evaluate the Responses given by this model and determinate is relaibility.the study builds a combined dataset from SQuAD, HotpotQA, and TriviaQA. Using GPT-4o mini, it generates responses and defines annotation rules to label hallucinations, evaluating dataset properties and fine-tuning performance for improved model accuracy
